mapper.insert: insert into weekly (cafeName, menuName, wFlag, dateFlag) values (#{cafeName}, #{menuName}, #{wFlag}, #{dateFlag})
mapper.select: select * from weekly where cafeName=#{cafeName} order by dateFlag, wFlag

select m.cafeName, m.menuName, m.detailName, m.price, m.point, m.likeNum, m.path, w.dateFlag, w.wFlag from menu as m, weekly as w where m.cafeName=w.cafeName and m.menuName=w.menuName and w.cafeName=#{cafeName} and w.wFlag=#{wFlag} order by dateFlag
